title: Residential Land for Sale in Madiwela, Nugegoda
details:
11 Perches Prime Residential Land for Sale in Madiwela, Pita Kotte, Nugegoda. Well secure place with parapet wall right round. Just 5 mints to Sri Jayawaradanapura Hospital and close to Parliament complex. Easy access to Pita Kotte, Nugegoda, Maharagama

Pipe line water supply

- 3 phase electricity

- Wide access road

Ideal residential area in view of its prime location and the ever increasing value of land in the area.

- Few mints walk to leading Banks, Financial Institutions, Super Markets, leading International Schools etc

Clear title & finance could be readily obtained from banks if necessary
